item.title: Migration and Cultural Integration: A Dual Perspective
item.author: ChatGPT
item.description: Task2 - 250 words 40 minutes Some believe that immigrants to a country should follow the national lifestyle of the country that they are migrating to, while others think that both immigrants and the local people should embrace the various cultures in a country. The essay structure is broken down into: Introduction: Background: Globalization has led to increased migration. Introduce Question: Some believe migrants should adopt the national lifestyle of their new country, while others believe in embracing cultural diversity.
